bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with yi qi 疫氣 , epidemic qi. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ma chi xian 馬齒莧 quotes Jing yan fang 經驗方 : 禳解疫氣：六月六日，采馬齒莧晒乾。元旦煮熟，同鹽、醋食 之，可解疫癘氣 , “To ward off epidemic qi: On the sixth day of the sixth month collect ma chi xian and dry it. On New Year’s Day boil it thoroughly and eat it with salt and vinegar. This can dissolve epidemic qi ”.
